title: IT60114: Internetworking And Applications - Quick Facts
text:
IT60114
Course name | INTERNETWORKING AND APPLICATIONS
Offered by | Information Technology
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisite: NoneIntroduction to the Internet and Protocols; Switching and Routing : Layer-2/Layer-3 switching, RIP, OSPF, ISIS, BGP; Multilayer LAN; Multicast and broadcast; Multimedia networks: Streaming stored audio and video, Webcast; Broadband access network; Applied Internetworking : Voice-over-IP (VoIP), Quality-of-Service (QoS), Convergence of Voice, Video and data; Access Network fundamentals : RAS, Access Routers, DSL, MAN, VPN; Network Security : ACL, Firewall.
